scripts.build: ./node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc && cp -R src/ledger-service dist/ && cp -R src/core-api dist/
scripts.createVersion: git tag $(npm run version --silent) && git push --tags
scripts.publish: wrap() { yarn build && git commit -am "creating new version" && git push origin master && git tag $@ && git push origin $@; }; wrap
